prompt: Explain the concept of attention mechanisms.
answer: Attention mechanisms allow neural networks to focus on relevant parts of the input when producing outputs. Instead of processing all input equally, the model learns to assign different importance weights to different parts. This is especially useful in sequence-to-sequence tasks like translation, where the model needs to focus on different source words when generating each target word.
